attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Farman homes has been refused all loaning facilities after 8 months of chase from the banks(RBS) because the
current market is not feasible and the ongoing project are not in interest of the bank to take further interest
so they will call it a day and they will recover the money by bankrupting us and making the us lose our 30%
to recover their 70% then giving us the money to complete the project if this is the case we appeal to prime
minister to bailout us or tell us to be bankrupted

rejection.details: The e-petitions website is not the appropriate channel for your concerns. We suggest you visit the Real Help Now website http://www.realhelpnow.gov.uk to get further advice and support.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
